comment.body: "There's already one called ZeroSearch, you can find it on either 0list or ZeroName." I would like something like Google.
Awesome! (Also, I wish in the blogs we can upvote user comments. That'd be nice.)

> [yetanotheruser](#comment_1_1Lvn5HR9dBaMBo6mT8fCmM9TdxtHQ8g6QP): Whould there be pm's in zerome?

I hope so. ^-^

> [freekazoid](#comment_1_1FtUiy2KtVRiLTjs2QrvDJUSx2wMzeeavX): 

For some reason your comment is stuck on '- Just now'. (Also, when I published this, it immediately went under your comment, even though mine's newer.)

Will the merger sites be more like Tumblr, Facebook, Twitter, or OTHER?

OTHER = Any other social sites out there.

I have a feature request. In the 'CONNECTED SITES' list, you should be able to create groups. The items in the group should not load any resources until opened as well to help CPU load time on older devices while on the homepage. (When having thousands of websites connected, it gets laggy.)

I have a suggestion: In the 'FILES' section in ZeroHello, there should be a way to view the file without ever leaving ZeroHello. For example, there should be another coloum called 'VIEW FILE' and when you click it, it will popup like how the images do in ZeroMe.

OPTIONAL FILE           VIEW FILE<<           SIZE           PEERS           UPLOADED               FINISHED
